11#ifndef VPX_VPX_VPX_INTEGER_H_
12#define VPX_VPX_VPX_INTEGER_H_
13
14/* get ptrdiff_t, size_t, wchar_t, NULL */
15#include <stddef.h>
16
17#if defined(_MSC_VER)
18#define VPX_FORCE_INLINE __forceinline
19#define VPX_INLINE __inline
20#else
21#define VPX_FORCE_INLINE __inline__ __attribute__((always_inline))
22// TODO(jbb): Allow a way to force inline off for older compilers.
23#define VPX_INLINE inline
24#endif
25
26/* Assume platforms have the C99 standard integer types. */
27
28#if defined(__cplusplus)
29#if !defined(__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS)
30#define __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS
31#endif
32#if !defined(__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS)
33#define __STDC_LIMIT_MACROS
34#endif
35#endif // __cplusplus
36
37#include <inttypes.h>
38#include <stdint.h>
39
40#endif // VPX_VPX_VPX_INTEGER_H_
41
